Column.value:
%synchNewClassNotesSpace="
"% %synchNewOperationNotesSpace="
"% %synchNewOperationBodySpace="
"% %synchNewAttributeNotesSpace="
"%
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // %fileName% // Implementation of the %elemType% %className% // Created on: %eaDateTime% %if classAuthor != ""% // Original author: %classAuthor% %endIf% ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

$COMMENT="WARNING: DO NOT MODIFY THIS TEMPLATE BELOW THIS POINT" $guid = "EA_" + %TRIM(eaGUID,"{}")% $guid = %REPLACE($guid,"-","_")% $guid += "__INCLUDED_" #if !defined($guid) #define $guid
 %ImportSection% %Import% %list="Namespace" @separator="

"% #endif // !defined($guid)

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if connectorType!="Dependency" or connectorStereotype!="import"% %endTemplate%
%PI=""% $inclType = %connectorTag:"incl_type"% $inclType = %TO_UPPER($inclType)%
$inclBasePath = %connectorTag:"incl_base_path"% %if $inclBasePath != ""% $termPathSep = %RIGHT("$inclBasePath",1)% %if $termPathSep != "/"% $inclBasePath += "/" %endIf% %endIf%
$inclExt = %connectorTag:"incl_ext"% %if $inclExt != ""% $extSep = %LEFT($inclExt,1)% %if $extSep != "."% $inclExt = "." + $inclExt %endIf% %else% %if $inclType!="STD C++"% $inclExt = ".h" + $inclExt %endIf% %endIf%
#include
%if $inclType=="STD C" or $inclType=="STD C++"% <$inclBasePath%connectorDestElemName%$inclExt> %endTemplate%
%qt%$inclBasePath%connectorDestElemName%$inclExt%qt%

Column.name: Template

DataSet.name: Model Data Types - Code and DDL

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""%
$qualName = %classQualName% $resPos = %FIND($qualName, "::")%
%if $resPos == "-1"%
$pubFeatures1 = %list="Attribute" @separator="
" attScope=="Public" or linkAttAccess=="Public" or attScope=="Package" or linkAttAccess=="Package"% $pubFeatures1 = %TRIM($pubFeatures1, "
")% $pubFeatures1 += "

" + %list="Operation" @separator="
" opScope=="Public" or opScope=="Package"% $pubFeatures1 = %TRIM($pubFeatures1, "
")%
$protFeatures1 = "

" + %list="Attribute" @separator="
" attScope=="Protected" or linkAttAccess=="Protected"% $protFeatures1 = %TRIM($protFeatures1, "
")% $protFeatures1 += "

" + %list="Operation" @separator="
" opScope=="Protected"% $protFeatures1 = %TRIM($protFeatures1, "
")%
%endIf%
$pubFeatures2 = %list="InnerClass" @separator="

" classStereotype!="funptr" and classScope=="Public" or classScope=="Package"% + "

" $pubFeatures2 = %TRIM($pubFeatures2, "
")%
$protFeatures2 = "

" + %list="InnerClass" @separator="

" classStereotype!="funptr" and classScope=="Protected"% + "

" $protFeatures2 = %TRIM($protFeatures2, "
")%
$classFeatures = $pubFeatures2 $classFeatures = %TRIM($classFeatures, "
")% $classFeatures += "

" + $protFeatures2 $classFeatures = %TRIM($classFeatures, "
")%
%PI="

"%
%if $classFeatures != ""% $classFeatures %endIf%
$nonClassFeatures = $pubFeatures1 $nonClassFeatures = %TRIM($nonClassFeatures, "
")% $nonClassFeatures += "

" + $protFeatures1 $nonClassFeatures = %TRIM($nonClassFeatures, "
")%
%if $nonClassFeatures != ""% $nonClassFeatures %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype == "enumeration"% %PI=""% %attName% %attInitial ? " = " value% %endTemplate%
%if attTag:"define" == "true"% %PI=""% #define %attName% %attInitial ? value% %endTemplate%
%PI=" "%
%if attStatic!="T" and attScope=="Private"% static %endIf%
%attConst=="T" ? "const" : ""% %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile" : ""%
%if attStereotype=="struct"% struct %elseIf attStereotype=="union"% union %elseIf attStereotype=="enumeration"% enum %endIf%
%attType%
%PI=""% %attContainment=="By Reference" ? "*" : ""% %attName%
%if classStereotype == "struct" or classStereotype == "union"% %attTag:"bitfield" ? ":" value% %endIf%
%if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf%
%if classStereotype != "struct" and classStereotype != "union" and attStereotype != "struct" and attStereotype !="union" and classTag:"typedef" != "true"% %attInitial ? " = " value% %endIf% ;

%OperationNotes% %PI=""% %OperationDeclaration%

$bodyLoc = %opTag:"bodyLocation"%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
/**************************************************** * %fileName% * Created on: %eaDateTime% * Implementation of the %elemType% %className% %if classAuthor != ""% * Original author: %classAuthor% %endIf% ****************************************************/

$guid = "EA_" + %TRIM(eaGUID,"{}")% $guid = %REPLACE($guid,"-","_")% $guid += "__INCLUDED_"

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype == "enumeration"% %PI=""% %attName% %attInitial ? " = " value% %endTemplate%
%if attTag:"define" == "true"% %PI=""% #define %attName% %attInitial ? value% %endTemplate%
%PI=" "%
$attType = ""
$attType += %attStatic=="T" ? "static " : ""% $attType += %attConst=="T" ? "const " : ""% $attType += %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile " : ""%
%if attStereotype=="struct"% $attType += "struct " %elseIf attStereotype=="union"% $attType += "union " %elseIf attStereotype=="enumeration"% $attType += "enum " %endIf%
$attType += %attType%
%PI=""% $attType += %attContainment=="By Reference" ? "*" : ""%
$attName = %attName%
%if classStereotype == "struct" or classStereotype == "union"% $attName = %attTag:"bitfield" ? ": " value% %endIf%
%if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% $attName += " " + %attContainerType% %endIf%
$attInitials = "" %if classStereotype != "struct" and classStereotype != "union" and attStereotype != "struct" and attStereotype !="union" and classTag:"typedef" != "true"% $attInitials = " = " + %attInitial ? " = " value% %endIf%
%if $attInitials == ""% EA_pub_extern_def($attType,$attname); %else% EA_pub_extern_def_init($attType,$attname,$attInitials); %endIf%

Column.name: Template

%PI=""% $inclType = %connectorTag:"incl_type"% $inclType = %TO_UPPER($inclType)%
$inclBasePath = %connectorTag:"incl_base_path"% %if $inclBasePath != ""% $termPathSep = %RIGHT("$inclBasePath",1)% %if $termPathSep != "/"% $inclBasePath += "/" %endIf% %endIf%
$inclExt = %connectorTag:"incl_ext"% %if $inclExt != ""% $extSep = %LEFT($inclExt,1)% %if $extSep != "."% $inclExt = "." + $inclExt %endIf% %else% %if $inclType!="STD C++"% $inclExt = ".h" + $inclExt %endIf% %endIf%
#include
%if $inclType=="STD C" or $inclType=="STD C++"% <$inclBasePath%connectorDestElemName%$inclExt> %endTemplate%
%qt%$inclBasePath%connectorDestElemName%$inclExt%qt%

%if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% $attName += %attContainerType% %endIf%
$attInitial = "" %if classStereotype != "struct" and classStereotype != "union" and attStereotype != "struct" and attStereotype !="union" and classTag:"typedef" != "true"% $attInitial = %attInitial ? " = " value% %endIf%
%if $attInitial == ""% EA_pub_static_definition($attType,$attName); %else% EA_pub_static_definition_init($attType,$attName,$attInitial); %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI="

"% %ClassNotes%
$forwardDecls = %list="Class__InnerForwardDeclarations" @separator="
" classStereotype=="struct" and classScope=="Public" or classScope=="Package"% + "

" $forwardDecls = %TRIM($forwardDecls, "
")%
$delegateDecls = %list="Class__FunctionPointerDeclarations" @separator="
" classStereotype=="funptr" and classScope=="Public" or classScope=="Package"% + "

" $delegateDecls = %TRIM($delegateDecls, "
")%
$pubFnTypeDefs = %list="Operation" @separator="
" opStereotype=="funptrdef" and opScope=="Public" or opScope=="Package"% $pubFnTypeDefs = %TRIM($pubFnTypeDefs, "
")%
$dummyPureFunctionDefs = %list="Operation__InterfacePureDummy" @separator="
" opStereotype=="funptrdef" and opScope=="Public" or opScope=="Package"% $dummyPureFunctionDefs = %TRIM($dummyPureFunctionDefs, "
")%
%if $forwardDecls != ""% $forwardDecls = "/* Interface struct forward declarations */
" + $forwardDecls $forwardDecls %endIf%
%if $delegateDecls != ""% $delegateDecls = "/* Function pointer declarations */
" + $delegateDecls $delegateDecls %endIf%
%if $pubFnTypeDefs != ""% $pubFnTypeDefs = "/* Interface function pointer types */
" + $pubFnTypeDefs $pubFnTypeDefs %endIf%
%ClassBody%
%if $dummyPureFunctionDefs != ""% $dummyPureFunctionDefs %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if opTag:"define" == "true"% %endTemplate%
{ $wrap = %genOptWrapComment=="-1" ? "-1" : "40"% $behavior = %WRAP_LINES(opBehavior, $wrap, "\t/*", "*/")%
%if $behavior != ""% $behavior\n\n %endIf%
%if opCode != ""% %WRAP_LINES(opCode, "-1", "\t", "")% %elseIf opReturnType == "int" or opReturnType == "short" or opReturnType == "long" or opReturnType == "char" or opReturnType == "float" or opReturnType == "double" or opReturnType == "unsigned int" or opReturnType == "unsigned short" or opReturnType == "unsigned long" or opReturnType == "unsigned char"% \treturn 0; %elseIf opReturnType != "void" and opReturnType != ""% \treturn NULL; %elseIf opReturnType == "void"% \t %endIf% }

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=" "%
%if opTag:"define" == "true"% %paramName% %endTemplate%
%paramFixed=="T" ? "const" : ""% %paramIsEnum=="T" ? "enum" : "" % %paramType% %if paramDefault != "" and paramDefault != "<none>"% %paramName% %endIf% %PI=""% %if paramDefault != "" and paramDefault != "<none>"% = %paramDefault% %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI="

"% %ClassNotes%
$forwardDecls = %list="Class__InnerForwardDeclarations" @separator="

" classStereotype=="struct"% + "

" $forwardDecls = %TRIM($forwardDecls, "
")%
$delegateDecls = %list="Class__FunctionPointerDeclarations" @separator="

" classStereotype=="funptr" and classScope=="Public" or classScope=="Package"% + "

" $delegateDecls = %TRIM($delegateDecls, "
")%
%if $forwardDecls != ""% $forwardDecls = "/* Class struct forward declarations */
" + $forwardDecls $forwardDecls %endIf%
%if $delegateDecls != ""% $delegateDecls = "/* Function pointer declarations */
" + $delegateDecls $delegateDecls %endIf%
%ClassBody%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$delegateDecls = %list="Operation" @separator="

" opStereotype=="delegate" and opScope=="Public"% + "

" $delegateDecls = %TRIM($delegateDecls, "
")%
%if $delegateDecls != ""% /* Delegate operation declarations */ $delegateDecls %endIf%
